long.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,gu,hi,mr,ms,nl,no,p:
The extension will be useful for developers or those who want to refresh a page (for example, to stay online).

ğŸŒŸ Easy auto refresh â€“ a super cool tool that makes refreshing web pages a breeze! Are you tired of constantly clicking the button to see the latest updates? Well, with this app, you don't have to worry about that anymore! It's like having a magical helper that does all the job for you.

ğŸˆ Automate the reload: easy auto refresh makes reloading any page as easy as pie! No more clicking and waiting â€“ just sit back and let the extension do its thing.

-----------
How to use:
1. Press on the extension icon
2. Choose any number of seconds/minutes you want a page to be refreshed
3. Click "Start" button.
4. Done! The tab will be refreshing over the period of time you wanted.
When you want to disable reloading press "Stop".

---------
Updates: 
1.0.1: Bug fixed when install paged opened every time a browser started
-----------

ğŸ•’ Customize Time Intervals: You can even customize how often you want the pages to reload. Want updates every few seconds? Or maybe every few minutes? Our app lets you choose.

ğŸ° No Hassle Installation: Installing the extension is a piece of cake! Just add it to your Google Chrome browser, and you're good to go. It's like adding a cool new feature to your browser!

ğŸ“š Get More Done: With Easy Auto Refresh, you can focus on other things while it takes care of refreshing the pages for you. It's like having a helpful assistant that frees up your time.

ğŸ“° Multiple Pages: Need to keep track of multiple web pages at once? Page auto refresher has got you covered! It can reload multiple tabs simultaneously, making it super convenient!

ğŸš€ Imagine this: You're checking out the latest updates on your favorite website or keeping an eye on your favorite online game. Instead of constantly refreshing the page yourself, easy auto refresher does it for you! It's like having a personal page updater

ğŸŒ± Save Resources: Automatic page reload is designed to be efficient, so it won't slow down your computer or use up too much internet data. It's like having a smart button that knows when to take a break.

ğŸ® Perfect for Everyone: Whether you're a social media enthusiast, a gaming aficionado, or a student doing research, Easy Page Refresh is perfect for all your web browsing needs. It's like having a handy tool that makes your online life easier

ğŸ¨ Easy to Use: Don't worry if you're not a tech whiz â€“ app is super easy to use! It has a simple interface and clear instructions, so you'll be refreshing pages like a pro in no time.

ğŸ† Stay Ahead of the Game: With extension, you'll always be up to date with the latest news, updates, and information. It's like having a secret weapon that keeps you ahead of the curve.

ğŸŒŸ Always Improving: We're always working to make fast page refresh even better. With regular updates and improvements, you can count on it to keep getting even more awesome

ğŸš€ Try easy auto refresh today and say goodbye to manual page reload forever! It's the perfect tool for anyone who wants to save time and hassle while browsing the web. Get ready to experience the magic of our edxtension â€“ your new favorite browsing buddy.

ğŸ‘ Thanks for choosing! I hope you enjoy the convenience it brings. If you have a moment, please consider leaving us some feedback to help us improve and serve you better in the future. Happy browsing! ğŸŒŸ
